paragraphs.content: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Galatians
paragraphs.contentHtml: <small>The Epistle of Paul the Apostle</small> <small>to the</small> Galatians

paragraphs.content: Chapter 1
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 1

paragraphs.content: Paul, an apostle, (not of men, neither by man, but by Jesus Christ, and God the Father, who raised him from the dead;)
paragraphs.contentHtml: Paul, an apostle, (not of men, neither by man, but by Jesus Christ, and God the Father, who raised him from the dead;)

paragraphs.content: And all the brethren which are with me, unto the churches of Galatia:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And all the brethren which are with me, unto the churches of Galatia:

paragraphs.content: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father, and from our Lord Jesus Christ,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father, and from our Lord Jesus Christ,

paragraphs.content: Who gave himself for our sins, that he might deliver us from this present evil world, according to the will of God and our Father:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Who gave himself for our sins, that he might deliver us from this present evil world, according to the will of God and our Father:

paragraphs.content: To whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.

paragraphs.content: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel:
paragraphs.contentHtml: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel:

paragraphs.content: Which is not another; but there be some that trouble you, and would pervert the gospel of Christ.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Which is not another; but there be some that trouble you, and would pervert the gospel of Christ.

paragraphs.content: But though we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you, let him be accursed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But though we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you, let him be accursed.

paragraphs.content: As we said before, so say I now again, If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received, let him be accursed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: As we said before, so say I now again, If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received, let him be accursed.

paragraphs.content: For do I now persuade men, or God? or do I seek to please men? for if I yet pleased men, I should not be the servant of Christ.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For do I now persuade men, or God? or do I seek to please men? for if I yet pleased men, I should not be the servant of Christ.

paragraphs.content: But I certify you, brethren, that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But I certify you, brethren, that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man.

paragraphs.content: For I neither received it of man, neither was I taught it, but by the revelation of Jesus Christ.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For I neither received it of man, neither was I taught it, but by the revelation of Jesus Christ.

paragraphs.content: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews’ religion, how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God, and wasted it:
paragraphs.contentHtml: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews’ religion, how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God, and wasted it:

paragraphs.content: And profited in the Jews’ religion above many my equals in mine own nation, being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And profited in the Jews’ religion above many my equals in mine own nation, being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers.

paragraphs.content: But when it pleased God, who separated me from my mother’s womb, and called me by his grace,
paragraphs.contentHtml: But when it pleased God, who separated me from my mother’s womb, and called me by his grace,

paragraphs.content: To reveal his Son in me, that I might preach him among the heathen; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood:
paragraphs.contentHtml: To reveal his Son in me, that I might preach him among the heathen; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood:

paragraphs.content: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me; but I went into Arabia, and returned again unto Damascus.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me; but I went into Arabia, and returned again unto Damascus.

paragraphs.content: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter, and abode with him fifteen days.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter, and abode with him fifteen days.

paragraphs.content: But other of the apostles saw I none, save James the Lord’s brother.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But other of the apostles saw I none, save James the Lord’s brother.

paragraphs.content: Now the things which I write unto you, behold, before God, I lie not.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now the things which I write unto you, behold, before God, I lie not.

paragraphs.content: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia;

paragraphs.content: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judæa which were in Christ:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judæa which were in Christ:

paragraphs.content: But they had heard only, That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But they had heard only, That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed.

paragraphs.content: And they glorified God in me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And they glorified God in me.
